abstract: Jenna Wortham tackles readers’ etiquette questions in the Internet Protocol column on Gadgetwise. This week, she addresses errant e-mails and when to update your “relationship status” on Facebook.
snippet: Jenna Wortham tackles readers’ etiquette questions in the Internet Protocol column on Gadgetwise. This week, she addresses errant e-mails and when to update your “relationship status” on Facebook.
lead_paragraph: Jenna Wortham, a Times technology reporter who contributes regularly to Bits, writes a technology etiquette column for our sister blog, Gadgetwise.

headline.main: Internet Etiquette: E-Mail and Facebook Relationships
